system.description:
Ends ongoing magical effects within range. Automatically dispels spells of 3rd level or lower; higher level spells require a check.

Scaling: At dice count 3, automatically dispels 5th level spells. At dice count 6, affects a 20-foot radius. At dice count 9, automatically dispels 7th level spells. At dice count 12, can target multiple effects. At dice count 15, creates an antimagic pulse that dispels everything in 60 feet.
